name: Bikini Island
description:
A plane full of international supermodels crashes in the sea. Only 3 of them survive and now they must learn the hard way how to exist in a dangerous and difficult world.

Fight off waves of monsters of increasing difficulty as you wait for the rescue squad to come for you.
Develop skills and capacities to help you on your survival: gardening, building, hunting and more.
Pick 3 girls among 6 and see if you can resist a full week in this game mixing elements of RPG and simulation.
